text: فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن صَدَّ عَنۡهُۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيرًا
translation: (55) And some among them believed in it,[194] and some among them were averse to it. And sufficient is Hell as a blaze.
footnotes: [194]- In what was given to them.  Also interpreted as "in him," i.e., Muḥammad (ﷺ).
